architecture.title: Built for Modern DAOs
architecture.subtitle: CreateDAO v2 uses cutting-edge patterns for maximum efficiency and security.

gasEfficient.title: Gas Efficient
gasEfficient.description: EIP-1167 minimal proxy clones reduce deployment cost by ~90%. Each clone is just 45 bytes instead of 15KB+.

fairDistribution.title: Fair Distribution
fairDistribution.description: 1% to creator for initial governance, 99% to treasury. Tokens unlock only through governance votes.

autoDelegation.title: Auto-Delegation
autoDelegation.description: Token holders get voting power instantly. No manual delegation needed - vote right away.

managerRole.title: Manager Role
managerRole.description: Built-in manager address for off-chain authorization. Perfect for DAO management platforms.

timelockSecurity.title: Timelock Security
timelockSecurity.description: 1-day delay on all treasury actions. Community has time to react to proposals.

openbookReady.title: OpenBook Ready
openbookReady.description: Built for OpenBook's multi-entity architecture. Manage off-chain legal entities with full transparency.

whatYouGet.title: What Gets Deployed
whatYouGet.subtitle: One transaction deploys a complete, production-ready DAO system.

token.title: DAO Token
token.description: ERC20Votes governance token with 18 decimals. Auto-delegates to holders for instant voting power.

treasury.title: Treasury
treasury.description: TimelockController that holds 99% of tokens. All transfers require governance approval.

governor.title: Governor
governor.description: Full-featured governance with OpenZeppelin extensions. Create proposals, vote, and execute on-chain.

steps.title: Three Simple Steps
steps.subtitle: Launch your DAO in under 5 minutes.

step1.title: Connect & Select
step1.description: Connect your wallet and choose Sepolia (testnet) or Base (mainnet).

step2.title: Name Your DAO
step2.description: Enter your DAO name, token name, symbol, and total supply.

step3.title: Deploy
step3.description: Confirm one transaction. Your complete DAO is live instantly.

snapshot.name: Snapshot
snapshot.description: Gasless voting and signaling for DAOs. Create proposals and vote without gas fees using off-chain signatures.

tally.name: Tally
tally.description: Industry-standard on-chain governance interface. Create proposals, vote, delegate, and track governance activity.
